title: The Waffle Chronicles: 82 Flufftastic Waffles Recipes
description: Taking your boring morning Waffles and putting the ultimate spin on it couldn't be better!Enjoy 82 Waffle Recipes, that takes the classic golden warm fluffy waffle into overdrive with fun, exciting and creative new recipes to make. Breakfast will never be the same, great recipes to share and make with the family. Get Creative with these fun Waffle Waffles with Coconut and PineappleGhirardelliÂ® Chocolate WafflesToasted Waffle Ice Cream SandwichSweet Potato Wafflesand many more!
author: Recipe Spark
